info.title: BigCommerce Widgets API
info.description: Widgets API allows developers to programatically inject content into a BigCommerce theme. To learn how to use Widgets, see our [Widgets Overview](/api-docs/storefront/widgets/widgets-overview).

schema.description: The JSON schema of data for this template. Used to validate a configuration.

template.description: Handlebars HTML content. Also has access to Stencil Paper helpers.

schema.description: The JSON schema of data for this template. Used to validate a configuration.

template.description: The widget template HTML. Supports Handlebars and Paper helpers.

date_created.description: The date on which this object was initially created.

date_modified.description: The date on which this object was last updated.

data.name: Header Images
data.template: {{#each images}}{{/each}}

allOf.description: Error payload for the BigCommerce API.

title.description: The error title describing the particular error.

422.description: This is the result of missing required fields, or of invalid data. See the response for more details.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

parameters.name: widget_template_kind
parameters.description: The kind of widget template.

schema.description: The JSON schema of data for this template. Used to validate a configuration.

template.description: The widget template HTML. Supports Handlebars and Paper helpers.

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.

data.name: Header Images
data.template: {{#each images}}{{/each}}

data.name: Simple List
data.template:
{{#each list_items}}
  • {{text}}
    • {{/each}}

data.name: Simple HTML
data.template: {{{html}}}

data.name: Simple Text with Styling
data.template: {{text}}

data.name: YouTube Embed
data.template: <iframe    id='ytplayer-{{_.id}}'    type='text/html'    width='{{width}}'    height='{{height}}'    src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{video_id}}?autoplay={{autoplay}}&color={{color}}&controls={{controls}}&disablekb={{disablekb}}&fs={{fs}}&rel={{rel}}&showinfo={{showinfo}}'    frameborder='{{frameborder}}'>  </iframe>

data.name: Slider Template
data.template:
{{#each slides}}
    {{/each}}

get.description:
Returns a list of unique [*Theme Regions*](/api-reference/storefront/widgets-api/models/themeregion) in a template file.

**Required Query**
* templateFile

parameters.name: templateFile
parameters.description: The template file, for example: `templateFile=pages/home`.

TemplateUUID.name: uuid
TemplateUUID.description: The identifier for a specific template.

FilterWidgetTemplateUUIDParam.name: widget_template_uuid
FilterWidgetTemplateUUIDParam.description: The identifier for a specific widget template.

LayoutUUID.name: uuid
LayoutUUID.description: The identifier for a specific layout.

PlacementUUID.name: uuid
PlacementUUID.description: The identifier for a specific placement.

WidgetUUID.name: uuid
WidgetUUID.description: The identifier for a specific widget.

FilterWidgetUUIDParam.name: widget_uuid
FilterWidgetUUIDParam.description: The identifier for a specific widget.

PageParam.name: page
PageParam.description: Specifies the page number in a limited (paginated) list of products.

LimitParam.name: limit
LimitParam.description: Controls the number of items per page in a limited (paginated) list of products.

QueryWidgetsParam.name: query
QueryWidgetsParam.description: The query string associated with a widget's name and description.

data.template: <iframe    id='ytplayer-{{_.id}}'    type='text/html'    width='{{width}}'    height='{{height}}'    src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{video_id}}?autoplay={{autoplay}}&color={{color}}&controls={{controls}}&disablekb={{disablekb}}&fs={{fs}}&rel={{rel}}&showinfo={{showinfo}}'    frameborder='{{frameborder}}'>  </iframe>

data.name: Slider Template
data.template:
{{#each slides}}
    {{/each}}

data.name: PayPal Credit Banner - Cart Page (728x90)
PayPal Credit Banner - Home Page (728x90)
PayPal Credit Banner - Product Details Page (234x60)
Braintree PayPal Credit Banner - Cart Page (728x90)

data.name: Header Images
data.template: {{#each images}}{{/each}}

meta.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

pagination.description: Data about the response, including pagination and collection totals.

total.description: Total number of items in the result set.

count.description: Total number of items in the collection response.

per_page.description: The amount of items returned in the collection per page, controlled by the limit parameter.

current_page.description: The page you are currently on within the collection.

total_pages.description: The total number of pages in the collection.

links.description: Pagination links for the previous and next parts of the whole collection.

previous.description: Link to the previous page returned in the response.

current.description: Link to the current page returned in the response.

next.description: Link to the next page returned in the response.
